description:
Hizuru and Nezu watch on as Shinpei returns to Kofunes` house to defeat Mio`s shadow. However, he encounters Ushio, whom he should not have run into until a later time. Like Shinpei, Ushio has been stuck in a loop on the 24th, the day of the Summer Festival. As Shinpei tries to make sense of Ushio`s appearance, he is ambushed by Mio`s shadow.
Source: Disney+
